APPRIS::Analysis SLR
SummaryPackage variablesSynopsisDescriptionGeneral documentationMethods
Summary
APPRIS::Analysis::SLR - Object representing an analysis run
Package variables
No package variables defined.
Included modules
APPRIS::Utils::Argument qw ( rearrange )
APPRIS::Utils::Exception qw ( throw warning deprecate )
Synopsis
  my $analysis = APPRIS::Analysis::SLR->new(
    -result      => ,
    -functional_residue  => ,
  );
Description
A representation of analysis of SLR within the APPRIS system.
Object to store details of an analysis run.

Methods code
DESTROYdescriptionprevnextTop
sub DESTROY {}
alignmentdescriptionprevnextTop
sub alignment {
	my ($self) = shift;
	$self->{'alignment'} = shift if(@_);
	return $self->{'alignment'};
}
newdescriptionprevnextTop
sub new {
	my ($caller) = shift;

	my ($caller_is_obj) = ref($caller);
	return $caller if $caller_is_obj;
	my ($class) = $caller_is_obj || $caller;
	my ($self) = bless {}, $class;

	my (
		$result,			$alignment,
		$tree
	)
	= rearrange( [
		'result',			'alignment',
		'tree'
	],
	@_
	);

 	$self->result($result);
 	$self->alignment($alignment);
	$self->tree($tree);
		
	return $self;
}
resultdescriptionprevnextTop
sub result {
	my ($self) = shift;
	$self->{'result'} = shift if(@_);
	return $self->{'result'};
}
treedescriptionprevnextTop
sub tree {
	my ($self) = shift;
	$self->{'tree'} = shift if(@_);
	return $self->{'tree'};
}
